title: WTB: t206 Cobb bat off or green (SGC 40-60)

posts.post_title: WTB: t206 Cobb bat off or green (SGC 40-60)
posts.post_content:
Anyone have a nice one in SGC 40-60 for sale?  A rarer back would be a bonus but not a must.  

Please send email or IM.  Thanks,

David R
Just COllect has a Green SGC50 on ebay auctions ......good luck !
Still hoping to buy one before Christmas.
David - Jay (oldjudge in Net54) has a beautiful SGC 40 bat-off for sale.

David--I have a nice SGC 40 bat off for $950. I got the card from Ted for that price and he got it from Barry at that price. If you want to see some scans (my scanner sucks but you'll get the idea) send me an email at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url]

Best---Jay
